==Abilities and Attacks==
''Most attack names are unofficial.''
===Normal===
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = State Shift
|desc_1      = When hit by {{Electro}} or {{Pyro}} attacks, the Whirling Electro Fungus will enter an Activated or Scorched state respectively, gaining enhanced attacks. A Whirling Electro Fungus can only undergo state shift once.
* If the Whirling Electro Fungus is defeated while Activated or Scorched, it may drop {{Item|Inactivated Fungal Nucleus}}, {{Item|Dormant Fungal Nucleus}}, and {{Item|Robust Fungal Nucleus}}, while the drop rates for {{Item|Fungal Spores}}, {{Item|Luminescent Pollen}}, and {{Item|Crystalline Cyst Dust}} will greatly reduce.

|name_2      = Whirling Rush
|desc_2      = Rapidly spins while charging at the player, dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
* '''Activated:''' Speed increased, this attack will be chained 3 times in a row.
* '''Scorched:''' Speed reduced, DMG increased to '''100% ATK''', knockback increased.
|file_2      = Whirling Electro Fungus Whirling Rush
|caption_2   = Normal
|file_2_2    = Whirling Electro Fungus Whirling Rush 2
|caption_2_2 = Activated
|file_2_3    = Whirling Electro Fungus Whirling Rush 3
|caption_2_3 = Scorched

|name_3      = Whirling Bump
|desc_3      = Rapidly spins before bumping into the player, dealing '''30% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
* '''Scorched:''' DMG increased to '''60% ATK''', knockback increased.
}}

===Fabulous Fungus Frenzy===
<section begin="fff skills"/>
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy       = Whirling Electro Fungus

|name_1      = Skill: Thunderous Cry
|desc_1      = Unleashes an Electro shockwave that deals '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}} to nearby opponents, entering a temporary Activated state in the process. In this Activated state, its Thundering Lashes will have its DMG increased to '''203% ATK''' and attack more often.<br />''How can you spin around so fast without getting dizzy? Paimon really wants to know...''
|file_1      = Whirling Electro Fungus Thunderous Cry

|name_2      = Glaring Bolt
|desc_2      = Charges up Elemental energy and causes its next Thundering Lash to deal an additional '''10% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}. Additionally, the first opponent hit by this Skill will have their DEF decreased by '''40%''' for '''6''' seconds.

|name_3      = Thundering Lashes
|desc_3      = Rushes at nearby opponents, swiveling around and performing another return slash after it hits and passes one target by, thus dealing 2 instances of '''62% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
}}<!--
--><section end="fff skills"/>

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A spore organism of some intelligence. It possesses extreme adaptability.<br />Research has shown that this sort of fungal beast's internal electric current will change periodically. If further developed, perhaps this study may give rise to a wide range of uses...|[[Archive]]}}
